V3 AWAIBLE HERE : http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/145450





Map by Scarifice [Fr]

This is a multigame map with 8 minigames :


NEW - A race in an office with many traps and lazers

NEW - A battle in a big fan (as a trampoline)

NEW - A knife ring (From map mg_ring_v2, I enjoy this so I integrated into my map ;) )

- A knife battle in a big maze (with one gun in the middle of the maze and mines)

- A shotguns battle in the dark (with explosive barrels and mini maze)

- A climb level (1'30 min to climb or autogive knives)

- A M-249 battle in a winter area

- A knife battle in a radioactive dock

Bugs on the first version (mg_scari_multigame_v1) were corrected and some things have improved summers.


Please give me your suggestions and comments !

Enjoy ! ;)



9.61 Mo in .BSP
